signals.name: Ownership & Getting Things Done
signals.description: Taking responsibility for outcomes, driving projects to completion, delivering results

signals.name: Working in Ambiguity
signals.description: Operating effectively with unclear requirements, managing uncertainty, making progress without all answers

signals.name: Collaboration & Teamwork
signals.description: Working effectively with others, cross-functional partnerships, team dynamics

signals.name: Conflict Resolution
signals.description: Handling disagreements, managing difficult conversations, finding resolution

signals.name: Leadership & Influence
signals.description: Leading without authority, influencing decisions, driving change, mentoring

signals.name: Craft & Quality
signals.description: Code quality, technical excellence, best practices, reliability

signals.name: Customer / Product Sense
signals.description: Understanding user needs, product thinking, business impact

signals.name: People Management
signals.description: Managing direct reports, coaching, performance management, team building

signals.name: Execution & Delivery
signals.description: Project management, planning, shipping on time, managing scope

signals.name: Learning & Growth
signals.description: Continuous improvement, feedback incorporation, skill development

company_archetypes.name: FAANG / Big Tech
company_archetypes.description: Large, established tech companies (Amazon, Meta, Google, Apple, Microsoft, Netflix)

company_archetypes.name: Hypergrowth Startup
company_archetypes.description: Fast-growing startups with high ambiguity and rapid change

company_archetypes.name: Enterprise / Established Company
company_archetypes.description: Large, established non-tech companies with mature processes
